Requirement: the system must achieve a top speed of 80 km/h under standard conditions (rider weight 75 kg).
the motor must respond to throttle input within 50 ms for smooth acceleration.
the system must prioritize battery efficiency over performance when battery level drops below 20%.
the vehicle must maintain stability at speeds up to 80 km/h on wet surfaces.
the braking system must reduce speed from 60 km/h to 0 within 15 meters on dry pavement.
the regenerative braking system must recover at least 10% of energy during deceleration.
the system must limit acceleration to 0.5 m/s² when carrying a passenger (total weight > 120 kg).
the motor power output must not exceed 750w under normal operation.
the system must support a range of 100 km on a single charge at 40 km/h.
the suspension must adjust automatically to road conditions within 100 ms.
the system must log performance data every 10 seconds for diagnostics.
the vehicle must operate silently below 20 km/h for urban environments.
the throttle response must be adjustable via a mobile app within 1 second.
the system must detect and compensate for tire pressure loss within 5 seconds.
the motor must maintain consistent torque across a temperature range of -10°c to 40°c.
the system must support a payload capacity of 150 kg without performance degradation.
the vehicle must accelerate from 0 to 50 km/h in under 6 seconds.
the system must reduce power output by 20% in eco mode.
the traction control system must activate within 50 ms of wheel slip detection.
the system must provide real-time speed data with 99% accuracy.
the braking system must engage abs when deceleration exceeds 0.8g.
the vehicle must withstand a side impact of 5 kn without structural failure.
the system must alert the rider of obstacles within 2 meters ahead.
the headlights must automatically adjust brightness based on ambient light within 200 ms.
the safety system must lock the vehicle if the rider’s helmet is not detected.
the system must allow manual override of all safety locks via a key fob.
the vehicle must stop within 5 meters when an emergency brake is triggered.
the system must detect rider fatigue via grip sensors after 30 minutes of riding.
the airbags (if equipped) must deploy within 20 ms of a collision detection.
the system must maintain balance at 0 km/h for at least 10 seconds (self-balancing mode).
the vehicle must withstand 1000 charge cycles without battery capacity dropping below 80%.
the system must alert the rider if tire wear exceeds 50%.
the crash detection system must notify emergency services within 10 seconds.
the system must limit speed to 25 km/h in pedestrian zones.
the vehicle must resist water ingress up to 1 meter submersion for 30 minutes.
the system must perform a self-diagnostic check within 5 seconds of startup.
the horn must produce a sound level of at least 90 db at 5 meters.
the system must prevent motor startup if the kickstand is down.
the safety system must log all incidents with timestamps for review.
the vehicle must support over-the-air firmware updates without interrupting operation.
the dashboard must display speed, battery level, and range with a refresh rate of 1 hz.
the system must allow riders to set a custom speed limit via the ui within 2 seconds.
the ui must provide audible alerts for low battery at 10% intervals.
the display must remain legible in direct sunlight (minimum 1000 nits brightness).
the system must support voice commands for navigation with 95% accuracy.
the ui must switch to night mode automatically within 500 ms of darkness detection.
the dashboard must show real-time diagnostics using at least 50% of the screen.
the dashboard must dedicate 80% of the screen to navigation during active routes.
the system must provide haptic feedback on handlebars for critical alerts.
the ui must support a touchscreen response time of under 100 ms.
the system must display a warning if connectivity drops for more than 5 seconds.
the ui must allow riders to toggle eco mode with a single button press.
the system must store up to 10 recent routes for navigation history.
the display must support multilingual text with real-time translation.
the ui must lock non-critical features while the vehicle is in motion.
the battery management system must balance cells within 1 hour of charging start.
the system must shut down non-essential features when battery drops below 5%.
the battery must charge from 0% to 80% within 4 hours using a standard charger.
the system must predict remaining range with 95% accuracy every 5 minutes.
the battery must maintain 90% capacity after 500 cycles at 25°c.
the system must limit current draw to 20a during peak acceleration.
the battery must include a thermal shutdown at 60°c to prevent overheating.
the system must support fast charging to 50% in 30 minutes with a compatible charger.
the battery status must be accessible via a mobile app within 1 second.
the system must reduce power by 10% for every 5°c above 40°c ambient temperature.
the battery must provide a warning at 15% capacity remaining.
the system must log charge cycles for warranty validation.
the battery must support a minimum operating temperature of -15°c.
the system must prevent charging if the battery temperature exceeds 50°c.
the battery management system must detect faults within 2 seconds.
the system must connect to a mobile app via bluetooth within 3 seconds.
the vehicle must support gps tracking with 5-meter accuracy.
the system must upload diagnostic data to the cloud every 24 hours.
the connectivity module must support 4g lte with a fallback to 3g.
the system must encrypt all data transmissions with aes-256.
the vehicle must broadcast its location to nearby vehicles every 500 ms.
the system must allow remote locking via a mobile app within 2 seconds.
the connectivity must remain active in standby mode for 48 hours.
the system must support ota updates over wi-fi with a 10 mb/s minimum speed.
the vehicle must integrate with smart helmets via bluetooth 5.0.
the system must detect unauthorized access attempts within 1 second.
the connectivity system must log all network failures for diagnostics.
the vehicle must support v2v communication within a 100-meter radius.
the system must alert the rider if the mobile app disconnects for over 10 seconds.
the connectivity must prioritize emergency data transmission within 100 ms.
the system must perform a full diagnostic check every 500 km.
the maintenance system must predict tire replacement within a 100 km accuracy.
the vehicle must alert the rider of oil levels (if applicable) every 100 km.
the system must schedule maintenance based on usage patterns within 7 days.
the maintenance log must store data for up to 2 years.
the system must notify the rider of brake pad wear at 75% depletion.
the vehicle must support a self-test mode accessible via the ui.
the system must detect chain tension issues within 10 km of occurrence.
the maintenance system must alert for battery health checks every 6 months.
the vehicle must include a manual override for all automated maintenance alerts.
the system must ensure all lights function during a pre-ride check.
the vehicle must support a modular design for easy part replacement.
the system must log all maintenance events with rider confirmation.
the maintenance alerts must be dismissible via the mobile app.
the system must provide a maintenance cost estimate within 10% accuracy.
